pageContext.title: In brief: Agritech accelerator and investor launches in Singapore
pageContext.content:
The Yield Lab is adding the Yield Lab Asia Pacific to its global network. Based in Singapore, the new offshoot will focus on driving innovation across the entire region.

The Yield Lab Accelerators operate in North America, Europe, and Latin America, and invest US$100,000 into early-stage agrifood tech startups. These startups take part in tailored accelerator programming, receive one-on-one mentorship, and gain access to The Yield Lab’s global network.

Founded in 2014, The Yield Lab focuses on technologies in crop production and plant science, animal health and welfare, precision agriculture, supply chain and logistics, sustainability, and food ingredients. The Yield Lab also makes seed and series A investments into opportunities selected from its accelerator graduates and other agrifood tech opportunities.

Those interested in the 2019 Yield Lab Asia Pacific program are invited to apply online.

Source: Press release

seo.title: Agritech investor The Yield Lab launches in Singapore
seo.description: The Yield Lab Accelerators invest US$100,000 into early stage agrifood tech startups.
